epic.title: Personalized Shopping Experience
epic.description: Enable a tailored e-commerce experience by leveraging AI to recommend products based on individual user behavior and preferences.

stories.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
stories.description: Implement an AI-based system to provide personalized product recommendations to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptanceCriteria: System displays at least 5 personalized product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update in real-time based on user interactions such as clicks and purchases.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to non-personalized suggestions.

tasks.title: Integrate user profile and purchase history data
tasks.description: Connect to existing databases/services to retrieve user browsing and purchase history to be used as input for recommendations.

tasks.title: Develop recommendation model training pipeline
tasks.description: Set up and train ML models that generate personalized recommendations based on historical data.

tasks.title: Integrate recommendation results into homepage UI
tasks.description: Implement frontend components to display personalized recommendations and ensure they update in real-time.

tasks.title: Optimize recommendation latency
tasks.description: Ensure recommendations load within 500ms and system handles 10,000 concurrent users without degradation.

tasks.title: Ensure GDPR and CCPA compliance
tasks.description: Verify all recommendation processes comply with privacy regulations, including user consent and data handling.

notes: Assumed that the platform already has user accounts, product catalog, and tracking mechanisms in place. Further clarification needed on the specific AI algorithms and data sources to be used. Dependencies include access to user profile data, product catalog APIs, and an ML model training pipeline.
